A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With this film it is clear in which direction Disney really wants to take their $4billion investment\, and it isn't encouraging. \n\nWith a script that was clearly influenced by the need to appeal to the large asian box office (which results in painfully uninspired\, on the nose dialogue throughout)\, a breakneck pace that doesn't allow any scene to breathe\, vapid plot lines that the film would've been better off without and constant attempts at Marvel like humour\, THE LAST JEDI is a true disappointment.
